text: To begin, log in to your eBay account,
then navigate to eBay's Help & Contact hub

by clicking this tab
in the navigation bar.

Some of eBay's most
frequently asked questions
are addressed in the articles listed here.

You can also use keywords
to search for an article
that addresses your specific issue.
If you don't find what you're looking for,
scroll to the bottom of the article

to see a few different
ways you can contact eBay.
The "Have us call you" option

will have eBay call you after
you submit your phone number.

You will see an estimated
wait time for the call back.
For assistance with fraudulent activity,
you can call this number here.

We'll also put it in
the description below.

This line cannot be used
for other account issues.

Another option is to chat with
eBay's automated assistant.
When you select this option,
you will enter a chat with an AI
that will use prompts to assist you.

The "Chat with us" option
will put you in contact
with an eBay agent.

You may be prompted to
answer a few questions first
so you can be paired with an agent
who can best help solve your issue.

You can also get in touch
with eBay through Twitter.
Tweet the @askeBay handle to receive help
from an eBay team member.
